name: Empty The Bag
description:
This Game has been made for the 1 week long "Mental Health Jam", organized by Arius Black Studio.

It tells about overthinking and rumination, according to the Jam theme : "Feast", as our character gets overwhelmed by informations he has trouble to swallow.

As a solo made game in a short time, it may be a little unstable and strange to get use to, so please be forgiving :)
